briefTitle: Impact of SPN on Infection Rate, Duration of Mechanical Ventilation & Rehabilitation in ICU Patients

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Expected ICU stay \> 5 days
* Expected survival \> 7 days
* No contraindication to EN
* Obtained informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Refusal of consent
* Age \< 18 years
* Short bowel syndrome
* Significant persistent gastrointestinal dysfunction with ileus
* High output proximal fistula (\> 1.5 liter/d)
* Patients receiving PN

outcomeMeasures.title: Documented Infection Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Infection, defined according to CDC criteria during the ICU and hospital stay, occurrence between day 9 and day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Hours on Mechanical Ventilation in All Patients
outcomeMeasures.description: Mechanical ventilation hours during study duration (days 1-28)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibiotic Free Days
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days between day 9 to day 28 (follow-up period) free of antibiotics

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Energy Intake During the Intervention Period , Between Day 4 and Day 8.
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of energy target; in the SPN group the goal was to achieve 100% of the energy target during intervention (day 4 to day 8.The energy target was measured by indirect calorimetry in 198 patients of 305(65%),otherwise energy target was calculated by 25 kcal per kg of ideal body weight for women and 30 kcal per kg of ideal body weight for men and anamnestic body weight was used for patients with a body mass index of 20 kg/m2 or lower.

outcomeMeasures.title: Protein Delivery During the Intervention Period From Day 4 to Day 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of protein target between day 4 to 8. Protein target was set to 1.2 g per kg of ideal body weight a day.
